title: Free League Publishing Set to Release “Fiery Angels” Expansion for Blade Runner RPG on April 2nd
description: Free League Publishing has announced the launch of Case File 02: Fiery Angels, the first official expansion for the Blade Runner The Roleplaying Game, scheduled for release on April 2nd. This addition builds on the success of the award-winning game, introducing a new investigation that promises to engage players with its complex narrative and challenges. …

title: Modiphius Announces Pre-Order for Achtung! Cthulhu Starter Set, Shipping Begins in April
description: Modiphius Entertainment announced today that pre-orders for its new Achtung! Cthulhu 2d20 starter set are now available. The game, which mixes elements of pulp adventure and occult horror, is scheduled to begin shipping in April 2024. The Achtung! Cthulhu 2d20 starter set introduces players to a world where a group of heroes battles against occult …

title: Armello: The Board Game Makes a Royal Entrance on Kickstarter
description: King of the Castle Games Company has launched a Kickstarter campaign for “Armello: The Board Game,” a tabletop adaptation of the popular video game Armello. The campaign has garnered significant support, with pledges reaching US$ 115,993, surpassing the initial goal of US$ 20,000. The funding drive is set to conclude on April 5, with 23 …
